name: Xmas Monster Mayhem For Kids
description:
No Ads,
No External Link
Just the Fun.

Xmas Monster Mayhem is an amazingly beautiful game featuring a cute cartoonish monster truck in the winter season chasing after little monsters and collecting gifts that they have stolen.

The gameplay is pretty simple and the controls are extremely easy. You can tap on the right of the screen to accelerate the monster truck and you can tap on the left of the screen to apply brakes or reverse the truck.

You will be guided by onscreen target indicators about the location of snowman or gifts or evil mocking penguins.

In each mission you will be required to hit specific number of snowmen or penguins and collect certain number of gifts.

The game presents the players with beautiful christmasy graphics and cartoonish funky vehicle physics so that players can enjoy it to the maximum.

The game is specially made for kids so there are no ads and any kind of external link that might lead your kid out of the app. The app is safe and secure for your kid to have a good time.
